name: Space Revolution (JoshyOshKenoshi)
description:
Created for the Unity Course Community Jam. Theme: Spin.

You are a lone star pilot, fighting off hordes of enemy ships. But there's a twist - you can only shoot by spinning!

To move around the screen, use either the left joystick on a gamepad or the WASD keys on a keyboard.

To fire, rotate your ship using either the triggers on a gamepad or the left and right arrow keys on a keyboard.

To deploy an energy blast, press either one of the bumpers on a gamepad or the space key on a keyboard.

(Gamepad recommended for play)
